abstract: Detroit Tigers rout Baltimore Orioles, 15-2, in spring training opener.
lead_paragraph: Yoenis Cespedes hit a grand slam in his first game for Detroit, and Ian Kinsler added a three-run homer against the Baltimore Orioles.

headline.main: Cespedes’s Blast Fuels Spring Training Rout by Tigers
headline.print_headline: Cespedes’s Blast Fuels Rout by Tigers

snippet: Yoenis Cespedes hit a grand slam in his first game for Detroit, and Ian Kinsler added a three-run homer against the Baltimore Orioles.
